contentrichtext.text: {{ethnic group| |group= Xo Dang |poptime= 127,148 (1999) |popplace=[[Vietnam]] 127,148 (1999) |rels= Traditional ([[Animism|animistic]]) |langs= [[Sedang language|Xo Dang]] [[Vietnamese language|Vietnamese]] as second languages? |related= ? }} The '''Xo Dang''' (or Xe Dang, Sedang; {{lang-vi|Người Xơ Đăng}}) are an ethnic group of [[Vietnam]]. Their main source of income is farming. They are also known to be involved with raising cattle and poultry. Religiously, they are largely [[Animism|animistic]]. Their language is part of the [[Mon–Khmer languages|Mon–Khmer]] language family. They celebrate Peng Chupi Festival. ==References== *[http://web.archive.org/web/20061016030425/http://www.vnnews.com/coci/0104/53.htm Xo Dang page] *http://hedo-vietnam.tripod.com/ethnic_groups/xo_dang.htm *[http://www.ethnologue.com/show_language.asp?code=zng Xo Dang language page] from Ethnologue site<!--This page does not mention Xo Dang!--> ==See also== *[[List of ethnic groups in Vietnam]] {{Ethnic groups in Vietnam}} [[Category:Ethnic groups in Vietnam]] {{Asia-ethno-group-stub}}
